releaseNotes.title: Enhanced Reporting and Mobile Improvements
releaseNotes.description: This release brings powerful new reporting features and significant mobile app enhancements.
features: Custom report builder with drag-and-drop interface
Real-time collaboration on financial documents
Advanced filtering options for transaction history
Mobile app offline mode for accessing reports
improvements: Improved search functionality across all modules
fixes: Fixed issue with VAT calculations for EU transactions
Resolved sync issues between desktop and mobile apps
Corrected currency conversion rounding errors

releaseNotes.title: Year-End Tax Preparation Update
releaseNotes.description: Essential updates for year-end tax preparation and compliance.
features: Automatic tax code updates for 2024/2025 tax year
Making Tax Digital (MTD) compliance enhancements
New payroll integration with automatic PAYE submissions
fixes: Fixed issue with CIS deductions not appearing in reports
Resolved printing problems with aged debtor reports
Corrected VAT return calculation edge cases

releaseNotes.title: Bank Feed Improvements
releaseNotes.description: Enhanced bank feed connectivity and transaction matching.
improvements: Support for 15 additional UK banking institutions
fixes: Fixed duplicate transactions appearing from certain banks
Resolved timeout issues with bank feed connections
Corrected issue with categorizing refund transactions

releaseNotes.title: Major Payroll Platform Redesign
releaseNotes.description: Complete redesign of the payroll interface with new automation features.
features: Completely redesigned user interface for better usability
Automatic pension enrollment calculations
Employee self-service portal
Integration with HMRC RTI (Real Time Information) system
Bulk payslip generation and distribution
improvements: Simplified payroll run process with step-by-step wizard

releaseNotes.title: Audit Trail and Security Enhancement
releaseNotes.description: Improved audit capabilities and enhanced security features.
features: Comprehensive audit trail for all transactions
Role-based access control with granular permissions
Automated backup scheduling with cloud storage integration
fixes: Fixed issue with user permissions not saving correctly
Resolved export problems with large data sets

releaseNotes.title: Cloud Platform Major Update
releaseNotes.description: Major platform update with new architecture and features.
features: New multi-currency support for international businesses
Advanced inventory management module
Integration marketplace with 50+ third-party apps
API access for custom integrations
Automated invoice reminders and payment collection
improvements: Complete UI refresh with modern design
Enhanced mobile app with feature parity to desktop
fixes: Resolved numerous legacy bugs from previous versions
Fixed data migration issues for upgrading users

releaseNotes.title: Summer Payroll Updates
improvements: Updated tax codes for mid-year changes
Enhanced reporting for student loan deductions
fixes: Fixed calculation errors for Scottish tax rates
Resolved issue with holiday pay calculations
Corrected rounding issues in National Insurance contributions

releaseNotes.title: Spring Feature Release
releaseNotes.description: New features for improved productivity and compliance.
features: Bulk invoice creation from recurring templates
Enhanced VAT management with automated calculations
New financial dashboard with key metrics
improvements: Faster report generation for year-end accounts
fixes: Fixed issue with journal entries not balancing correctly
Resolved chart of accounts customization problems

releaseNotes.title: Tax Year End Update
releaseNotes.description: Important updates for the new tax year.
features: Automatic tax year rollover functionality
Enhanced Making Tax Digital for VAT features
improvements: Updated tax rates and thresholds for 2024/2025
Better handling of partial year tax calculations
fixes: Fixed VAT return submission errors
Corrected tax code assignments for new employees

releaseNotes.title: Performance and Stability Update
releaseNotes.description: Focus on improving performance and fixing critical issues.
improvements: Optimized database queries for better performance
Reduced memory usage for large company files
fixes: Fixed critical crash when opening certain reports
Resolved data corruption issue in backup files
Corrected invoice numbering sequence problems
Fixed issue with email settings not being saved
